author: Tonia - USGS Wisconsin Internet Mapping
purpose: External (to webpack bundling) config file for the web services documentation.
notes: for uriList[i].parameters[i] = Add 'optional: true' if parameter is optional. Add 'showMap: true' if .geojson is an availableMedia option. Add 'link' and 'linkName' if additional information may be wanted.

resources.name: Agency
resources.description: The agency resource represents an agency that a member or source is an employee for.

uriList.description: This service returns a list of agencies.
This service returns an agency.
This service returns a member's agency.
This service returns a source's agency.

resources.name: Approval
resources.description: The approval resource represents an approval that is applied to a hwm or data file once reviewed and deemed complete.

uriList.description: This service returns a list of approvals.
This service returns an approval by it's ID.
This service returns a hwm approval by a hwm ID.
This service returns a data file approval by a data file ID.

resources.name: Counties
resources.description: The counties resource represents U.S. counties.

uriList.description: This service returns a list of counties.
This service returns a county by it's ID.
This service returns a list of counties for a state by state ID.
This service returns a list of counties for a state by state abbreviation.
This service returns a list of counties in a state where sites exists.

resources.name: Data Files
resources.description: The data file resource represents data files associated with sensors.

uriList.description: This service returns a list of data files. Without authentication, only approved data files are returned.
This service returns a data file by it's ID. Without authentication, only approved data files are returned.
This service returns a data file of a file that is of type data. Without authentication, only approved data files are returned.
This service returns a list of data files for an approval. Without authentication, only approved data files are returned.
This service returns a list of data files that meet the passed-in parameters. Without authentication, only approved data files are returned.

parameters.name: appoved
parameters.description: True for data files that are approved, false for those that are not.

parameters.name: processorId
parameters.description: Id for a member that processed the data file.

uriList.description: This service returns a list of data files for a sensor. Without authentication, only approved data files are returned.
This service returns a list of data files for a peak summary. Without authentication, only approved data files are returned.

resources.name: Datum Location
resources.description: The datum location (aka: objective point or referenece point) resource represents the datum location that can be associated with a site.

uriList.description: This service returns a list of datum locations.
This service returns a datum location by it's ID.
This service returns a list of datum locations with a vertical datum.
This service returns a list of datum locations at a site.

resources.name: Datum Location Type
resources.description: The datum location type resource represents a datum location type that can be added to a datum location (aka: objective point).

uriList.description: This service returns a list of datum location types.
This service returns a datum location type by it's ID.

parameters.name: datumLocationTypeId
parameters.description: Id of datum location type requested

uriList.description: This service returns a datum location type for a datum location.

resources.name: Deployment Priority
resources.description: The deployment priority resource represents deployment priorities that sites can have.

uriList.description: This service returns a list of deployment priorities.
This service returns a deployment priority by it's ID.
This service returns a deployment priority of a site.

resources.name: Deployment Type
resources.description: The deployment type resource represents deployment types that sensors can have.

uriList.description: This service returns a list of deployment types.
This service returns a deployment type by it's ID.
This service returns a deployment type of a sensor.
This service returns a list of deployment types of a sensor type.

resources.name: Event
resources.description: The event resource represents the event that sensor and hwms are created during.

uriList.description: This service returns a list of events.
This service returns an event by it's ID or Name.

parameters.name: eventValue
parameters.description: Id or Name (remove all spaces) of event requested

uriList.description: This service returns a list of events that a site has sensor and/or hwms created at.
This service returns a list of events that have this event type.
This service returns a list of events that have this event status.
This service returns the event that this hwm was created at.
This service returns the event that this sensor was deployed at.
This service returns a list of events that meet the passed-in parameters.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Date to start query, events that started on or after this date

resources.name: Event Status
resources.description: The event status resource represents event statuses that events can have.

uriList.description: This service returns a list of event statuses.
This service returns an event status by it's ID.
This service returns an event status of an event.

resources.name: Event Type
resources.description: The event type resource represents event types that events can have.

uriList.description: This service returns a list of event types.
This service returns an event type by it's ID.
This service returns an event type of an event.

resources.name: File
resources.description: The file type resource represents file types that files can have.

uriList.description: This service returns a list of files.
This service returns a file by it's ID.
This service returns a file item.
This service returns a list of files that were uploaded within the given date range.
This service returns a list of files for a hwm.
This service returns a list of file for a datum location (aka: objective/reference point).
This service returns a list of file that are of a given file type.
This service returns a list of files for a site.
This service returns a list of files that were uploaded by a given source.
This service returns a list of files for a data file.
This service returns a list of files for a sensor.
This service returns a list of files for an event.
This service returns a list of files for a site during a given event.

resources.name: File Type
resources.description: The file type resource represents file types that files can have.

uriList.description: This service returns a list of file types.
This service returns a file type by it's ID.
This service returns a file type of a file.

resources.name: Horizontal Collect Method
resources.description: The horizontal collect method resource represents horizontal collect method that sites, datum locations, and hwms can have.

uriList.description: This service returns a list of horizontal collect methods.
This service returns an horizontal collect method by it's ID.

parameters.name: hcollectId
parameters.description: Id of horizontal collect method requested

uriList.description: This service returns an horizontal collect method of an hwm.

resources.name: Horizontal Datum
resources.description: The horizontal datum resource represents horizontal datum that sites, datum locations, and hwms can have.

uriList.description: This service returns a list of horizontal datum.
This service returns an horizontal datum by it's ID.
This service returns an horizontal datum of a site.

resources.name: Housing Type
resources.description: The housing type resource represents housing type that sensors can have.

uriList.description: This service returns a list of housing types.
This service returns an housing type by it's ID.
This service returns an housing type of a sensor.

resources.name: HWM
resources.description: The hwm resource represents hwms that are found at site locations.

uriList.description: This service returns a list of hwms.
This service returns a hwm by it's ID.
This service returns a list of hwms found at an event.
This service returns a list of hwms found for an event within a state.
This service returns a list of hwms found at a site for an event.
This service returns a list of hwms that meet the passed-in parameters.

parameters.name: appoved
parameters.description: True for hwms that are approved, false for those that are not

parameters.name: memberId
parameters.description: Id of the member that either flagged or surveyed

uriList.description: This service returns a list of hwms for this approval.
This service returns a list of hwms that were flagged or surveyed by the given member.
This service returns a list of hwms with a given hwm quality.
This service returns a list of hwms with a given hwm type.
This service returns a list of hwms with a given horizontal method.
This service returns a list of hwms with a given vertical method.
This service returns a list of hwms at a given site.
This service returns a list of hwms with a given vertical datum.
This service returns a list of hwms with a given marker.
This service returns a list of hwms with a given peak summary.
This service returns a hwm that a given file was uploaded for.
This service returns a list of hwms that meet the passed-in parameters.

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: Comma separated list of event IDs (ex: '1,2,3' or '1')

parameters.name: eventTypeIDs
parameters.description: Comma separated list of event type IDs

parameters.name: states
parameters.description: Comma separated list of state abbreviations

parameters.name: counties
parameters.description: Comma separated list of county names (Include 'County' at the end, ex: 'Washington County')

parameters.name: hwmTypeIDs
parameters.description: Comma separated list of hwm type IDs

parameters.name: hwmQualIDs
parameters.description: Comma separated list of hwm quality IDs

parameters.name: surveyComplete
parameters.description: True or false: surveyed or not

parameters.name: stillWater
parameters.description: True or false: stillwater or not

resources.name: HWM Quality
resources.description: The hwm quality resource represents a hwm quality that can be added to a hwm.

uriList.description: This service returns a list of hwm qualities.
This service returns a hwm quality by it's ID.
This service returns a hwm quality for a hwm.

resources.name: HWM Type
resources.description: The hwm type resource represents a hwm type that can be added to a hwm.

uriList.description: This service returns a list of hwm types.
This service returns a hwm type by it's ID.
This service returns a hwm type for a hwm.

resources.name: Marker
resources.description: The marker resource represents a marker that can be associated with a hwm.

uriList.description: This service returns a list of markers.
This service returns a marker by it's ID.
This service returns a marker associated with a hwm.

resources.name: Network Name
resources.description: The netowrk name resource represents the network names that can be associated with a site.

uriList.description: This service returns a list of network names.
This service returns a network name by it's ID.
This service returns a list of network names associated with a site.

resources.name: Network Type
resources.description: The netowrk type resource represents the network types that can be associated with a site.

uriList.description: This service returns a list of network types.
This service returns a network type by it's ID.
This service returns a list of network types associated with a site.

resources.name: OP Control Identifier
resources.description: The op control identifier resource represents the op control identifier that can be associated with a datum location (aka: objective/reference point).

uriList.description: This service returns a list of op control identifiers.
This service returns an op control identifier by it's ID.

parameters.name: opControlId
parameters.description: Id of op control identifier requested

uriList.description: This service returns a list of op control identifiers for a datum location.

resources.name: OP Measurement
resources.description: The op measurement resource represents the op measurement that can be associated with an instrument's status and datum location (aka: objective/reference point).

uriList.description: This service returns a list of op measurements.
This service returns an op measurement by it's ID.
This service returns a list of op measurements for a datum location.
This service returns a list of op measurements for an sensor status.

resources.name: OP Quality
resources.description: The op quality resource represents the op quality that can be applied to an datum location (aka: objective/reference point).

uriList.description: This service returns a list of op qualities.
This service returns an op quality by it's ID.
This service returns an op quality for a datum location.

resources.name: Peak Summary
resources.description: The peak summary resource represents the peak summary that can be created using hwms and data file information for a site during an event.

uriList.description: This service returns a list of peak summaries.
This service returns a peak summary by it's ID.
This service returns a peak summary for a hwm. If unauthorized, only approved hwm will return a peak.
This service returns an peak summary for a data file. If unauthorized, only approved data file will return a peak.
This service returns a list of peak summaries for an event.
This service returns a list of peak summaries for a site.
This service returns a list of peak summaries for a site including event information.
This service returns a list of peak summaries including site information that meet the passed-in parameters.

parameters.name: eventIds
parameters.description: Comma separated list of event IDs (ex: '1,2,3' or '1')

parameters.name: eventTypeIDs
parameters.description: Comma separated list of event type IDs

parameters.name: states
parameters.description: Comma separated list of state abbreviation

parameters.name: counties
parameters.description: Comma separated list of county names (include 'County', ex: 'Washington County')

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Date to start searching (ex with format: '05/20/2015')

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Date to end searching (ex with format: '07/20/2015')

resources.name: Report Metrics
resources.description: The report metrics resource represents the reports that can be created to track activity related to an event.

uriList.description: This service returns a list of reporting metrics.
This service returns a reporting metrics by it's ID.
This service returns a list of report metrics that a member submitted.
This service returns a list of report metrics that were submitted for an event.
This service returns a list of report metrics that were submitted on a given date.
This service returns a list of report metrics that were submitted for an event within a given state.
This service returns a list of report metrics that meet the passed-in parameters.

parameters.name: stateNames
parameters.description: Comma separated list of state abbreviation

uriList.description: This service returns a report model with a list of report contacts included. Only returns in json.
This service returns a list of report models, with a list of report contacts included, that meet the passed-in parameters. Only returns in json.

parameters.name: stateNames
parameters.description: Comma separated list of state abbreviation

resources.name: Role
resources.description: The role resource represents the role that is applied to each member.

uriList.description: This service returns a list of roles.
This service returns a role by it's ID.
This service returns the role for a member.

resources.name: Sensor
resources.description: The sensor resource represents a sensor that can be deployed and retrieved at a site.

uriList.description: This service returns a list of sensors.
This service returns a sensor by it's ID.
This service returns a sensor that the given file was uploaded for.
This service returns a sensor associated with an sensor status.
This service returns a sensor for a data file.
This service returns a list of sensors that were deployed at a site.
This service returns a list of sensors with the given sensor type.
This service returns a list of sensors with the given sensor brand.
This service returns a list of sensors with the given deployment type.
This service returns a list of sensors that were deployed for an event.
This service returns a list of sensors deployed at a given site for an event.
This service returns a list of sensors that meet the passed-in parameters.

parameters.name: eventIds
parameters.description: Comma separated list of event IDs (ex: '1,2,3' or '1')

parameters.name: eventTypeIDs
parameters.description: Comma separated list of event type IDs

parameters.name: states
parameters.description: Comma separated list of state abbreviations

parameters.name: counties
parameters.description: Comma separated list of county names (Include 'County' at the end, ex: 'Washington County')

parameters.name: statusIDs
parameters.description: Comma separated list of sensor status IDs

parameters.name: collectionConditionIDs
parameters.description: Comma separated list of instrument collection condition IDs

parameters.name: sensorTypeIDs
parameters.description: Comma separated list of sensor type IDs

parameters.name: deploymentTypeIDs
parameters.description: Comma separated list of deployment type IDs

uriList.description: This service returns a list of a custom sensor view that meet the passed-in parameters.

parameters.name: view
parameters.description: string representing which sensor view is being requested. Required to be one of the following: 'baro_view', 'met_view', 'rdg_view', 'stormtide_view', or 'waveheight_view'

parameters.name: eventIds
parameters.description: Comma separated list of event IDs (ex: '1,2,3' or '1') OR event Names (be sure to remove spaces in names. ex: 'Sandy, Ike, OhioJul1976')

parameters.name: eventTypeIDs
parameters.description: Comma separated list of event type IDs

parameters.name: states
parameters.description: Comma separated list of state abbreviations

parameters.name: counties
parameters.description: Comma separated list of county names (Include 'County' at the end, ex: 'Washington County')

parameters.name: statusIDs
parameters.description: Comma separated list of sensor status IDs

parameters.name: collectionConditionIDs
parameters.description: Comma separated list of instrument collection condition IDs

parameters.name: sensorTypeIDs
parameters.description: Comma separated list of sensor type IDs

parameters.name: deploymentTypeIDs
parameters.description: Comma separated list of deployment type IDs

uriList.description: This service returns a list of sensors with their associated sensor statuses (instrument_status). (response can only be returned as .json)
This service returns a list of sensors with their associated sensor statuses (instrument_status) that were deployed at a site. (response can only be returned as .json).

resources.name: Sensor Brand
resources.description: The sensor brand resource represents a sensor brand that is associated with a sensor.

uriList.description: This service returns a list of sensor brands.
This service returns a sensor brand by it's ID.
This service returns the sensor brand for a sensor.

resources.name: Sensor Collect Condition
resources.description: The sensor collect condition resource represents an sensor collection condition that can be added to a sensor.

uriList.description: This service returns a list of sensor collection conditions.
This service returns an sensor collection condition by it's ID.

parameters.name: sensorCollectConditionId
parameters.description: Id of sensor collection condition requested

uriList.description: This service returns an sensor collection condition for a sensor.

resources.name: Sensor Status
resources.description: The sensor status resource represents a status that a sensor can have.

uriList.description: This service returns a list of sensor statuses.
This service returns an sensor status by it's ID.
This service returns a list of all the sensor statuses that a sensor has in descending order (most recent first).
This service returns the most recent sensor status of a sensor.

resources.name: Sensor Type
resources.description: The sensor type resource represents a sensor type that is associated with a sensor.

uriList.description: This service returns a list of sensor types. Includes a list of deployment types for each sensor type.
This service returns a sensor type by it's ID.
This service returns the sensor type for a sensor.
This service returns the sensor type for a deployment type.

resources.name: Site
resources.description: The site resource represents a location where hwms and/or sensors can be deployed at for an event.

uriList.description: This service returns a list of sites.
This service returns a site by it's ID.
This service returns a site by the site number, site name or site id. Please provide one of the optional parameters to find the site.

parameters.name: siteName
parameters.description: The site name (ex: could be same as number or similar to 'SSS-FL-COU-234'

uriList.description: This service returns a site that a file was uploaded at.
This service returns a site that a datum location (aka: objective/reference point) was created at.
This service returns a site that a hwm was found at.
This service returns a site that an sensor was deployed at.
This service returns a list of sites for an event (a hwm was found here and/or a sensor was deployed here).
This service returns a list of sites with a given network type.
This service returns a list of sites with a given network name.
This service returns a list of sites within a state.
This service returns a list of sites within a (optional) buffer distance using a latitude and longitude.

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: longitude value (be sure to include the negative sign)

parameters.name: buffer
parameters.description: buffer distance to search (in decimal degrees)

uriList.description: This service returns a list of sites with the given horizontal datum.
This service returns a list of sites that have the given landowner associated with it.
This service returns a list of sites that meet the passed-in parameters. Includes most recent OP, network names, and events.

parameters.name: stateNames
parameters.description: Comma separated list of state abbreviation

parameters.name: opDefined
parameters.description: 1 for sites with an datum location

parameters.name: hwmOnlySites
parameters.description: 1 for sites with hwms only (no sensors)

parameters.name: surveyedHWMs
parameters.description: true for sites with surveyed hwms only, false for those with unsurveyed hwms

parameters.name: sensorOnlySites
parameters.description: 1 for sites with sensors only (no hwms)

parameters.name: rdgOnlySites
parameters.description: 1 for sites that have an RDG sensor proposed or deployed or an RDG housing type listed

parameters.name: preDepBracketSitesOnly
parameters.description: 1 for sites that have a pre-deployed bracket listed

parameters.name: surveyedRPSitesOnly
parameters.description: 1 for sites that have a surveyed reference point listed

resources.name: Site Housing
resources.description: The site housing resource represents a site housing that is installed at a site.

uriList.description: This service returns a list of site housings.
This service returns a site housing by it's ID.
This service returns a list of site housings for a site.

resources.name: State
resources.description: The state resource represents a state in which a site is created.

uriList.description: This service returns a list of states.
This service returns a state by it's ID.
This service returns a list of states that have sites.

resources.name: Status Type
resources.description: The status type resource represents a status type that a sensor has.

uriList.description: This service returns a list of status types.
This service returns a status type by it's ID.
This service returns a status type for the given sensor status (each sensor can have multiple sensor statuses, ex: deployed, retrieved).

resources.name: Vertical Collection Method
resources.description: The vertical collection method resource represents a vertical collection method that is associated with a hwm.

uriList.description: This service returns a list of vertical collection methods.
This service returns a vertical collection method by it's ID.

parameters.name: vCollectMethodId
parameters.description: Id of vertical collection method requested

uriList.description: This service returns the vertical collection method for a hwm.

resources.name: Vertical Datum
resources.description: The vertical datum resource represents a vertical datum that is associated with a site, datum location and hwm.

uriList.description: This service returns a list of vertical datums.
This service returns a vertical datum by it's ID.
This service returns the vertical datum for a hwm
